newsitem.title: USA: US Filter says it will buy U.S. Water Co.
newsitem.headline: US Filter says it will buy U.S. Water Co.

text.p: U.S. Filter Corp said it will buy U.S. Water Co for an undisclosed sum.

Cedar Rapids, Iowa-based U.S. Water, which provides water softening products and services and drinking water treatment products, had 1996 revenues of more than $22 million, U.S. Filter said. The company has 21 local sales and service operations in eight midwestern states, U.S. Filter added.
Officials from U.S. Filter were not immediately available to comment.
U.S. Filter Chairman Richard Heckmann said in a statement the acquisition was U.S. Filter's "first step" into the residential water treatment market.
